If I'm visiting your area and you'd like to connect—whether for collaboration or just conversation—you can use [this form](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSc-c4bgAAoBV6IMzdCCJzdxuDWnX76oS9_Tp7UjPXEZnAD49g/viewform?usp=header). I'd love to get to know you!

I've worked across academic and applied settings and enjoy meeting people working on public problem-solving in any capacity.
